resources.string: Your ultimate academic companion. Ask general questions, unravel complex concepts, solve and understand difficult questions.
Master lecture material effortlessly. Your Key to Comprehensive Understanding. Get detailed insights saving you time while ensuring you grasp the essentials
Unlock your writing potential. Writer helps you express ideas eloquently and generate high-quality work. Streamline your writing process and excel in your assignments.
Enhance your learning experience. Generate multi-choice questions from lecture tailored to reinforce your understanding. Test your knowledge and prepare for exams.
Choose a section below and start studying.

Unknown error occurred
◉ Try again with a different input.
◉Try using shorter content.
◉ Note that it only supports English currently.
No text recognized in the attachment
Error happened while extracting text from attachment
Attach lecture PDF or paste content…
All messages in this section will be deleted.

string-array.name: chat_notes
string-array.item: This AI is Powered by Gemini.
It does not have knowledge of events after February 2023.
It may occasionally generate incorrect, irrelevant or incomplete answers.
This model only supports English currently.

resources.string: No API key found. Please add your Gemini API key in Settings.
If you don\'t have an API key yet, you can create one by following the instructions at [Google AI Studio website](https://aistudio.google.com/app/apikey)
